The TotalJobs＿c field on Account tracks the total number of ServiceJob＿c records to which a partner service provider Account is related.

What should be done to ensure that the TotalJobs＿c field is kept up to date?

choices.D: Build a Process Builder with an invocable action.
choices.C: Implement a workflow cross-object field update.
choices.B: Change TotalJobs＿c to a roll-up summary field.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Not master detail. "A"

A.
The keyword here is that the field is an optional lookup. Roll-up summaries are good for master detail, which in this case would not be the case. Therefore an apex trigger would be the best option.

questions.question_text:
Sometimes events on Salesforce need to be handled by an external system due to the scale or type of process being executed. Consider the use case of a user in
Salesforce needing to get pricing for an order they are building in Salesforce while on the phone with a customer.
The pricing logic already exists in a third-party system. Instead of recreating this logic in Salesforce, it will be leveraged by making a request of the third-party system. The response, in this case the pricing, will be returned and stored back in Salesforce.
What is the optimal solution?
